title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - CubCrafter NXCub - using the autopilot
description:
In this how to we are going to look how to use the autopilot in a CubCrafter NXCub which has been added to MSFS 2020 as part of Sim Update VII. We will look at all functions and use most of them during this video.

0:00 intro
0:10 start of explanation autopilot functions and location of buttons
06:21 enabling the autopilot and using the different autopilot functions
36:43 almost arrived at FD30R
